Rules:
########################################### 
 The rules: 
 To exit the game, enter "@ExitCode". 
 To go on the next level enter door number. 
 To go on the previous level enter @ExitDoor. 
 If you already at zero level, 
 Going on previous level will regenerate doors 
 ###########################################
DoorAbsent: There is no such door on this level
Restart: You reach the end! Game Restarting...
